abstract.para: &cockpit; enables you to add users to a running system and assign system administrator privileges to accounts.

topic.para: To add a new user to the system, proceed as follows:

step.para: Click Create new account to open the window that enables you to add a new user.
Fill in the user account details. You can assign a different home directory to the user in the Home directory text box. If you do not specify a directory, the standard /home/USERNAME path is used.
If you select Disallow password authentication, the user will have to use an authentication method other than filling in a password, for example, an SSH login.
Click Create to confirm the account.
To add an SSH key to the account, you need to modify the account as described in .
